name: crispi-oocss
description: Generator of configurable style rules in OOCSS (Object Oriented Cascading Style Sheets) format.

scripts.scss:watch: node-sass src/scss/styles.scss -o src/css && node-sass --watch src/scss/styles.scss -o src/css
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run scss && npm run build:complete && npm run build:light && npm run build:medium
